name: interview-exercise
description: The mono repo for containing the projects developed for the interview question.

scripts.install-dependencies: npx yarn -C front-end install && npx yarn -C person-service install
scripts.prebuild: npx yarn clean && npx yarn install-dependencies
scripts.build: npx yarn -C front-end build && npx yarn -C person-service build
scripts.clean: npx yarn -C front-end clean && npx yarn -C person-service clean
scripts.docker:down: cd front-end && docker-compose down && cd ../person-service && docker-compose down && cd ../database && docker-compose down && docker network remove test

author: Nicholas Adamou
